name: .KMNB
summary: Learn about .KMNB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use a KMNB file to restore your notes in Keep My Notes (Android). To do so:
Transfer your KMNB file to the device on which you want to restore your notes.
Open Keep My Notes, select the sandwich menu, and then select the Restore button.
Navigate to and open your KMNB file.
